name: Plenty O' Space
description:
Plenty O' Space is a fast-paced bullet hell game in a neon retro style. As your moveable area decreases, kill enemies to increase it again.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Mouse to aim
  • Shoot start text to start
  • R to restart

Credits

  • Music: "Neon Runner" by Eric Matyas https://soundimage.org
  • Sound effects: jsfxr https://sfxr.me/
  • Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P#standard-styles
  • Explosion Asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/camera-shake-fx-14...
